name: $active
desc: The nutrition is no longer being taken.

name: $completed
desc: Some of the actions that are implied by the nutrition usage may have occurred.  For example, the patient may have taken some of the nutrition.  Clinical decision support systems should take this status into account.

name: $entered-in-error
desc: The nutrition may be taken at some time in the future.

name: $intended
desc: Actions implied by the usage have been permanently halted, before all of them occurred. This should not be used if the statement was entered in error.

name: $stopped
desc: Actions implied by the usage have been temporarily halted, but are expected to continue later. May also be called 'suspended'.

name: $on-hold
desc: The state of the nutrition use is not currently known.

name: $unknown
desc: The nutrition was not consumed by the patient
